name: Piñata
description: Could you find empathy with a Piñata? Perhaps you just want to exercise or relieve some stress? The Piñata HTC Vive experience is designed to question your moral compass; what will it be, the chainsaw or the watermelon?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 330 MB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive compatible only

reviews.review_text: I could only reach half the items like other people mentioned, which is a really annoying bug that needs to be fixed as it spawns you just outside the pinate area, and I had to reach just at the edge of my boundaries to grab the stuff in the middle of the tables.   If that were fixed then i'd say it would be a neat little experience, but without teleportation or the ability to recenter your room so that you can have the center of your room in the center of the virtual area it's just not playable unless you have an enormous warehouse of a room to play in.   Currently I give it 2 bad memes out of 10, I wouldn't vote for it in the 2016 election if you paid me :^(
Great fun. Contrary to other reviewers I had no trouble navigating and playing the game, it all works as expected. Short but good.
